title: VR-Based Organizational Training Design: Applying Distributed Learning and Multimedia Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment incorporating VR technology and comparative analysis of 2D/3D learning media.

learning_goals: Learners can compare differences between VR and 2D video media to select effective training methods
Learners can optimize cognitive load when designing organizational training scenarios by applying spaced learning strategies
Learners can improve goal achievement rates by 20% by applying multimedia learning theory to the production of educational VR content
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
